name: articuno
description: A modern serialization framework for C++ built with modern, cutting-edge C++ support, and support for mapping to existing, arbitrary schemas for standard human-readable and binary formats.

icywind-archive.description: Support for the Articuno's proprietary binary format, IcyWind.

jsoncons-archive.description: Support for JSON, BSON, MsgPack, CBOR, and UBJSON archives via jsoncons.

pugixml-archive.description: Support for XML archives via PugiXML.

rapidyaml-archive.description: Support for YAML archives via RapidYAML.

toml11-archive.description: Support for TOML and INI archives via TOML11.
